department.ch: 能源工程研究所碩士班

goal.ch: 本課程旨在培養學生們於 1. 新式節能、潔能與創能領域之興趣與素養。 2. 修課同學以自主創意激發、結合簡報技巧等專題報告相關能力之訓練， 將於本課程獲得節能、潔能與創能領域實作之知識與經驗。 3.本課程為能源技術實作課程系列之一，屬於專題實作相關之指導課程。 4.專題實作領域以節能、潔能與創能領域為主，包含智慧電網、先進儲能以及新式潔能光電元件等
goal.en:
This course is a continuation course of ER5050  
(Research Project on Energy Technology I)
If you are going to take this course,  you must have already completed ER5050

This course aims to develop students in the
1. Interest and quality in the field of new energy saving, clean energy and creative energy.
2. Training of students‘ ability to stimulate their own creativity.
3. This course is one of the energy technology practical course series, belongs to the guidance course for  independent study in energy.
4. The field of independent study mainly focuses on energy saving, cleaning and innovation.

outline.ch:
1.協助引導學生對於題目訂定的方向。讓學生確認分組，開始進行專題實作討論。
2.專家演講
3.專題設計與元件效率改善實作與元件效率改善分析
4. 專題製作檢討與心得總結報告
5. 期末必須實作出成品並參加國內能源相關競賽
outline.en:
1. Help guide students in the direction of the topic. Asking students confirm the groups and begin the independent study implementation and discussion.
2. Expert speeches
3. Thematic design
Component(device) efficiency improvement implementation and analysis
4. Weekly progress report, mid-term report and summary report
5. At the end of the semester, the real device must be completed and must participate in energy-related competitions

gradMethod.ch: 期中報告(20％)、進度報告(40％)、期末成果報告與競賽計畫書(40％)
gradMethod.en: The grading distribution is as follows: a midterm report (20％), weekly progress reports (40％), and a final outcome report along with a competition project proposal (40％).

flexDiscription.ch: 期末報告與參賽計畫書撰寫
flexDiscription.en: final report and competition project proposal
